title.rendered: CMMC Quick Bytes – Process Overview & Best Practices

content.rendered:
CMMC Quick Bytes – Process Overview & Best Practices

CMMC Quick Bytes Series — In this series, Karl Bickmore teams up with cybersecurity training expert, Dana Mantilia, to tackle the hard-hitting CMMC questions.
 
In this interview, you’ll learn the overall process for CMMC, how to determine an appropriate budget, cybersecurity basics every DoD subcontractor should implement & the importance of working with a true CMMC-AB Registered Provider Organization.
